biotools.summary: Standalone client able to register Web-Services in different catalogues (e.g. BioMOBY, INB, etc.). In addition the tool is able to perform the deployment process of command line applications. The process first registers the service, then it creates the Web-Service implementation skeletons, and finally, it deploys the skeletons and the command-line application in a server.
